name: Chapel Tavern
description: Chapel Tavern is a popular craft cocktail and whiskey bar in Reno's Midtown district at 1099 S Virginia St. The bar features over 100 whiskeys from around the world, a diverse selection of craft beers, and artisan cocktails crafted by knowledgeable bartenders. The interior has earthy wood tones with communal seating, plus an outdoor beer garden with patio seating. Chapel hosts regular events including tap takeovers and Jupiter Fest, benefiting the Veterans Guest House. Whether you're a whiskey connoisseur or craft beer explorer, the bartenders here are known for guiding patrons to new favorites.
shortDescription: Midtown whiskey bar with 100+ selections, craft cocktails, and outdoor beer garden.

faqs.question: Where is Chapel Tavern located?
faqs.answer: Chapel Tavern is in Reno's vibrant Midtown district at 1495 S Virginia St, surrounded by restaurants and shops.

faqs.question: Does Chapel Tavern serve food?
faqs.answer: Yes, they offer a curated menu of elevated bar snacks and shareables that pair perfectly with their cocktail program.

faqs.question: Is Chapel Tavern good for groups?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. The unique chapel setting with its vaulted ceilings makes it a memorable spot for golf groups looking for post-round drinks.

meta.title: Chapel Tavern – Craft Cocktails in Reno's Midtown | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Experience craft cocktails in a beautifully restored 1930s chapel in Reno's Midtown. Perfect après-golf destination for groups visiting the High Sierra.

testimonials.quote: We ended every day of our golf trip at Chapel Tavern. Great selection, friendly bartenders, and the kind of place where your group can be loud and happy after a great round.
testimonials.author: Paul N.

testimonials.quote: Post-round drinks at Chapel Tavern are a must. Our whole group gathered here after 18 holes and the vibe was perfect. Good cocktails, sports on the TVs, and the staff handled our large tab easily.
testimonials.author: Brian K.
